title: MOVES-Wells Fargo Asset Management hires 2 execs to multi-asset solutions team
text: February 15, 2018 / 2:33 PM / in 11 minutes MOVES-Wells Fargo Asset Management hires 2 execs to multi-asset solutions team Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 15 (Reuters) - Wells Fargo Asset Management said on Thursday that it has expanded its multi-asset solutions team with two new senior leadership positions. Peter Weidner was named the head of factor solutions and Mark Brandreth was appointed senior portfolio manager in the firms multi-asset solutions team. Both Weidner and Brandreth, who will now be based in London, were previously with asset manager Schroders Plcâ€™s multi-asset team. (Reporting by Aishwarya Venugopal; Editing by Shailesh Kuber)
